title: v0.1.2
items: Automatic Navigation to precise tree and bank locations
Persistent Settings to retain user preferences across sessions
Human-like Random Delays for bot-detection resistance
Intelligent Banking Automation for automatic bank trips
Woodbox Support to store logs in wood boxes if available
Magic Notepaper Support to convert logs in inventory without banking
Crystallise Spell Support for enhanced woodcutting experience
World Hopping to avoid crowded areas and maximize resources
Statistics Page to display real-time stats including logs chopped and XP gained
Advanced Settings Page for additional customization options
12 Supported Chopping Locations including Burthorpe, Draynor Village, and Varrock
Control Buttons for starting and stopping the script
